javadoc: An interface that allows clients to receive log messages.

methods.name: messageLogged
methods.comment: Called when a log message is received.

params.name: message
params.comment: the message of the log event

params.name: isError
params.comment:
true if the message is considered an error, as opposed to an informational
        message.

name: LogListener
comment: An interface that allows clients to receive log messages.
